titleInfo.title: Jewelery of Princess Khnumet from Dashur

mods.abstract: Jewelry of Princess Khnumet from Dashur (Middle Kingdom Dynasty XII) at the Gizeh Museum; two ornately worked crowns of gold on either side of a decorative branch attached to a wooden pedestal, all three pieces on cushioned velvet surface; untitled print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
